Summary: 2 lights changed direction from E. to W. to N. to S. and moved toward each other.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fort Jennings
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home looking at the sky. Noticed "stars" moving slowly. One larger, and then 2-6 smaller lights following, seeming to appear and disappear. They would stop and start again. 2 lights changed direction from E. to W. to N. to S. and moved toward each other and crossed paths. I considered airplanes at first, but then noticed the stopping and starting, and direction changes. I thought that this was not an airplane or a satellite because of the motions. I was excited to see it. Went inside to have my husband observe also. The objects just seemed to disappear, but it was partly cloudy.
